name: Hearts (itch) (evilbrain)
description:
Made for Ham's Heart Jam

Keep your hearts safe by shooting and maneuvering them around enemies.
It's that maneuvering part that'll getcha!
Full hearts = Full firepower BUT more difficult to avoid enemies.
See how many waves you can beat. The game gives up after like 20 :P

Art & Programming - Rusty Hayes
Music & Sound - Ry4n64K
Fonts Courtesy of the Amazing SomePx
